item.title: Trump asserts that any Jewish person who votes for 'self professed Jew hater' Mamdani is 'a stupid person'
item.description: President Donald Trump asserted that any Jewish individuals who vote for Big Apple Democratic mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani are "stupid."
